entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 05:45 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
